author: luc
msg: added a protection against infinite loops that occur with some JVM (Sun before 1.4, JRockit, ...)

author: ppoddar
msg: OPENJPA-1180: Parameter processing for JPA 2.0. Query now distinguishes between bound and declared parameters. Holds all bound parameters in a single data structure instead of named/positional parameters in separate maps.

msg: Description: Added EhCache based Caching implementation and related test class
